title: General
stimulusHtml:
3 points maximum

No reference to the Latin is necessary.

1 point for request:

Allow the Trojans and/or their gods to settle, reach, or find a kingdom, home, or Latium.

1 point for each promise:

Aeneas will build a temple.
Aeneas will establish a festival.

It is not necessary to mention that the temple and festival are for Apollo and/or Hecate, but only one point is given if the temple and/or festival is said to be for the Sibyl.
descriptions:
Student response earns none of the available points.
